name: El Nido Resorts Miniloc Island

reviews.text: Staying in an expensive resort for the first time is a risk, that may either turn you off if it turns out bad and disappointing or be a starter of more expensive trips along the way. In our case, I am so Happy that we chose MINILOC as it delivered and gave us the best vacation we ever had.
reviews.title: A Paradise you would LOVE coming back

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All other accommodations in El Nido, whether in budget or in any of El Nido Resorts, have the same views and attractions to see and enjoy in this part of the world. What really differs among them all is the kind of services that each provides. Yes, it is expensive in Miniloc but with the kind of feeling that every single staff made us feel and the convenience and fun that its well-oiled activities and amenities catered to us is what worth the extra cost we paid. The feeling that you are well-taken care of and the ambience of the exclusivity and safety is what I love even more and way more special.
reviews.title: Amazing. Paradise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I love the rustic mood and ambience of Miniloc. And spending an afternoon and enjoying a sumptuous dinner in Lagen was truly a treat - experiencing the rustic and modern touch of both resorts.
reviews.title: outstanding
Absolute heaven
reviews.text: I love every minute of our stay in Miniloc and I will definitely go back one day. Photos attached give justice to superlatives that I avoided mentioning as words are not enough to describe the experience. Mabuhay, El Nido Resorts!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 3 nights / 4 days.
reviews.title: Well worth a short stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent 6 nights on Miniloc and what an experience, the staff were phenominal they took a genuine interest in you and provided excellent customer service. Staff in the resturant took the time to get to know what you liked and always tried to ensure that the food was available.
reviews.title: Heaven on Earth

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The resort organised all day tours this meant you could do as much or little as you pleased. All tours were proffessionally organised and most included lunch in a buffet or picnic style.
reviews.title: 5* staff, location and activities but 3* accommodation and food

reviews.text: Snorkelling gear was provided and swimming with the Jack fish in the resorts reef was a definate highlight. Kayaks were available to explore the islands, the small and big lagoon is well worth the trip.
reviews.title: A little too rustic

reviews.text: We stayed in a water cottage, we loved the quirkyness of the cottages, and watching the fish swim below while we were relaxing on the balcony. We found the staff could not do enough for you we enjoyed coming back to our room each evening to find a good night message, a tradittional story and a sweet on our bed - what a great touch!
reviews.title: Perfect for honeymooners

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The manger was outstanding, he took the time to have a conversation about our experience at the resort and organised a dinner for the three of us on a private island... he even knew our favourite wine ! he was very passionate about the island and our experience and took the time to get to know us !
reviews.title: Probably our best holiday ever!

reviews.text: This Resorts is the best of the best. We were at Miniloc already for the second time because we and especially our kids loved it so much the first time.
reviews.title: The "Last Frontiere"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff people are all amazing. The Resorts has no kids Club but it is not necessary at all. The staff is the kids Club - they take their time for the kids, entertain them and are their best friends after 1 day. We LOVE this place and we will come back next year for the 3rd time. It is a perfect place for a family holiday!
reviews.title: Wow! Yes!!

reviews.text: This is as close to paradise I ever have been.
reviews.title: Fab Vacation Destination

reviews.text: So lovely!
reviews.title: 50th Birthday Celebration - it was like going to heaven!!!

reviews.text: We had a waterfront room with the most perfect out door place with a big sofa. The bed, the bathroom, AC, everything was world class in the room. Wonderful bay view from the room.
reviews.title: If you want to be pampered.. choose this resort!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: pros: untouched beach, lagoons, islands, natural geography amazing, service at resorts outstanding, they don't seem to expect tip as resort is all inclusive but i'm sure they didn't mind when we did tip
reviews.title: unbelieveable beach resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: cons: difficult to get to (probably makes it so untouched); would definitely just go with the chartered plane
reviews.title: Our Perfect Piece of Paradise!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: i don't think i've been to a more beautiful beach/island although i have not been to seychelles or maldives
reviews.title: An amazing experience and stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: unexpected: they really can do anything you want them to do, everything is virtually included except for very specific items. i was hesitant about the price as i have a hard time paying over $400 USD for any hotel but the all inclusive nature of the resort justifies the cost. also they are very green and this is a good lesson on how to be green
reviews.title: Wonderful scenery, terrific hosts 2 stars for food and accommodation
A memorable place
reviews.text: From the moment you land at El Nido airport you can forget all your cares and let the staff take you by the hand for your entire stay at THE most beautiful location in the world – an undiscovered gem of both beauty but also service that we have never experienced anywhere else…

aka: El Nido Resort Miniloc Island Hotel
description: Miniloc Island is a rustic and charming hideaway reminiscent of a coastal village. Miniloc Island is located in El Nido, in northwestern Palawan. It takes a 75-minute direct flight from Manila to get to El Nido or a 6-hour travel by land from Puerto Princesa City (Palawan's Capital City).Miniloc Island Resort is tucked within a beautiful cove surrounded by towering limestone cliffs and a vibrant coral reef. It is a gateway to popular activity sites in a breath-taking location known for its high biodiversity. The resort has 50 cottages and rooms built in traditional Filipino design over the water, beside the beach, or surrounded by garden and limestone cliffs.
